description:
Mario Kart 64 is the original 3D kart racing game. Collect and fire off items,
maneuver around hazards, execute drifts and mini-turbos, risk shortcuts but
stay on the track, and race to victory in each course and cup.

mk64/0.2.description:
This apworld is still in development. Some features will be broken or missing.

Requires Archipelago 0.4.4

Put `mk64.apworld` in `/lib/worlds/`. You can generate a default YAML with the launcher's `Generate Template Settings` button.
mk64/0.2.title: Mario Kart 64 0.2

mk64/0.2.1.description:
The victory condition is 150cc Special Cup Gold. Some other options will come in the future.

- Fixed rules to allow turning off YAML settings:
  - HazardLocations
  - SecretLocations
  - ShuffleSpecialItemBoxes
- Fixed when the game receives items from the Archipelago Client, so it can happen while in menus
- Logic to reach the Mario Sign now properly requires the Blue Switch
- Adjusted a fence on Toad's Turnpike and one on Wario Stadium
  - The second Wario Stadium blue fence was mistakenly reversed, worse than how it was in 0.2

Requires Archipelago **0.4.4**. Put `mk64.apworld` in `/lib/worlds/`. You can generate a default YAML with the launcher's `Generate Template Settings` button. This apworld is still in development. Some features will be broken or missing.
mk64/0.2.1.title: Mario Kart 64 0.2.1

mk64/0.2.1b.description:
Hotfix to let generation succeed on webhosts.

<sub>(The automatically bundled Source code assets are invalid. Unzip the .apworld file for the real source.)</sub>
mk64/0.2.1b.title: Mario Kart 64 0.2.1b

mk64/0.2.1c.description:
Hotfix for generation in multiworlds with non-ASCII item names.

<sub>(The automatically bundled Source code assets are invalid. Unzip the .apworld file for the real source.)</sub>
mk64/0.2.1c.title: Mario Kart 64 0.2.1c

mk64/0.2.3.description:
- Compatibility fix for Archipelago 0.6.2 multiworlds.
- Options Change: `LogicDifficulty` options renamed from `generous`/`basic`/`advanced` to `basic`/`advanced`/`expert`. The default is still "`basic`" to suggest first time players should try the easiest of the three options.
---
- Progression items can now be placed in `Destroy Tree` and `Destroy Piranha Plant` locations.
- `Qualify`, `1st`, and `Take the Lead` location checks will correctly reference their own difficulty logic data instead of all courses using Rainbow Road's data.
- Cup Trophy location logic fixed.
- The third drift items available with `shuffle_drift_abilities: plentiful` will not count toward making courses easier to beat.
- Fix for non-ASCII player names.
- Minor code/performance improvements.
---
There is no basepatch update with this version so some more fixes are pending that. I've skipped version number 0.2.2 due to its internal use and the large time gap since the last version.

For use with **Archipelago 0.6.1 or newer**. Put `mk64.apworld` in `/custom_worlds/`. You can generate a default YAML with the launcher's Generate Template Settings button. This apworld is still in development. Some features will be broken or missing, and there is still a rare, pesky crash bug.

<sub>(The automatically bundled Source code assets are invalid. Unzip the .apworld file for the real source.)</sub>
mk64/0.2.3.title: Mario Kart 64 0.2.3

mk64/0.2.3b.description:
Hotfix for generation in multiworlds that query logic with extra switch items.

<sub>(The automatically bundled Source code assets are invalid. Unzip the .apworld file for the real source.)</sub>
mk64/0.2.3b.title: Mario Kart 64 0.2.3b
